content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257632,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tなんか理由をつけて徴兵","translatedEnglishLine":"They make excuses to conscript soldiers."},{"lineNumber":257633,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers gathered."},{"lineNumber":257634,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t帰路につくランス、コパンドンにもらった高速の高級うし車に乗っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance is on his way home, riding in a high-speed luxury ox cart received from Copandon."},{"lineNumber":257635,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tシィル、おつかれさまです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Seel, thank you for your hard work."},{"lineNumber":257636,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tあいつらあまっちょろい、俺様が言わないと本気にならないからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Those guys are too soft; they won't get serious unless I tell them."},{"lineNumber":257637,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tてな軽口を言うランスだが内心は分かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance speaks lightly like that, but deep down he understands."},{"lineNumber":257638,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t各国精一杯している、ランスが言わなくてもそれに似たような事は実際にもうしているはず","translatedEnglishLine":"Each country is doing their best; even if Lance doesn’t say it, they are probably already doing something similar."},{"lineNumber":257639,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t国土の半分を魔軍に支配され逃げ回り自らの命を守る事だけで精一杯の者が大半だろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Most are probably just scrambling to survive, their lands half controlled by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":257640,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t逃げた者も多くいるはずだ、今戦っている者達はほんとよく集まった勇気ある連中だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Many must have fled; those who are fighting now are truly brave people who gathered well."},{"lineNumber":257641,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tだが・・足りていない、このままではいずれ滅ぼされてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"But... it’s not enough; if things continue like this, they will eventually be destroyed."},{"lineNumber":257642,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t俺が・・早く、全ての魔人を倒し、この戦いを終わらせなければ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I must... quickly defeat all the demons and end this war..."},{"lineNumber":257643,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランスも重い物を背負っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance was carrying a heavy burden as well."},{"lineNumber":257644,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tシィルがそれを察して声をかけると・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Seel sensed it and spoke to him..."},{"lineNumber":257645,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tお前は俺のストレス発散奴隷だーとかスカートめくったりする","translatedEnglishLine":"He says things like 'You’re my stress-relief slave' and lifts up her skirt."},{"lineNumber":257646,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t（実際、ランスはそういう事でストレスをうまく発散させている）","translatedEnglishLine":"(In fact, Lance successfully relieves stress this way.)"},{"lineNumber":257647,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tあけましておめでとう","translatedEnglishLine":"Happy New Year."},{"lineNumber":257648,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランス城でそれぽい朝の儀式、おとそ、お年玉","translatedEnglishLine":"A morning ceremony fitting for the occasion at Lance Castle: New Year's sake and New Year's money."},{"lineNumber":257649,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t誰かが仕切る、さぁ、ここまで今は非常時なのですぐに行動に移りましょう","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone takes charge: ‘Now, this is an emergency, so let's move into action immediately.’"},{"lineNumber":257650,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tうう、情緒のわからんやつだ、お正月は３日は仕事したら駄目なんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, you have no sense of tradition. You can’t work for three days during New Year's."},{"lineNumber":257651,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tこれが人類にとって最後のお正月になってもいいのでしたらね","translatedEnglishLine":"Unless you want this to be humanity's last New Year's."},{"lineNumber":257652,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tまた、世界には今も死にかけている人が多数おり、ランスさんが動かないと今もまた・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, many people in the world are still on the brink of death, and if Lance doesn’t act, even now..."},{"lineNumber":257653,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tああ、もう・・わかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, alright, I get it already."},{"lineNumber":257654,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tだが、ひとつだけしなければいけない事がある、これだけして仕事に移る","translatedEnglishLine":"But there's one thing I must do first, just this, then I'll get to work."},{"lineNumber":257655,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t大丈夫、３時間で終わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, it will be done in three hours."},{"lineNumber":257656,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t姫はじめだー","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the first princess deed of the year!"},{"lineNumber":257657,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tさぁ、今年最初の俺様の初精液を受けれる幸運な女の子は誰かな・・よし、正月らしくあみだで決めよう","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, who will be the lucky girl to receive my first semen of the year? Alright, let's decide by lottery in the New Year's spirit."},{"lineNumber":257658,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tわくわくする子、いやがる子、いろいろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Some girls excited, some reluctant, various reactions."},{"lineNumber":257659,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t・・・シィルに決まった、またお前か・・だが、まぁ、それもよい","translatedEnglishLine":"...Seel was chosen, it's you again... but well, that's fine."},{"lineNumber":257660,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tて・・ランス様、昨晩その・・というか、６時間前に今年のやりおわりだからって・・その・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh... Lord Lance, about last night... or rather, six hours ago, since it was the end of this year's business... well..."},{"lineNumber":257661,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tがははは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha..."},{"lineNumber":257662,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t（ここエロシーンにするかは未定）","translatedEnglishLine":"(It’s undecided whether this will be an erotic scene.)"},{"lineNumber":257663,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tシィルと一緒に海岸に来るランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance arrives at the beach together with Seel."},{"lineNumber":257664,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t海か・・１０年前は・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The sea, huh... ten years ago..."},{"lineNumber":257665,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tＡ．冒険船があるが、今は使っている時では無い","translatedEnglishLine":"A. There is an adventure ship, but now is not the time to use it."},{"lineNumber":257666,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tＢ．冒険船があったらなぁ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"B. If only there was an adventure ship..."},{"lineNumber":257667,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tその時、海岸に何かが漂着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, something drifted ashore on the beach."},{"lineNumber":257668,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tｱｲﾃﾑかキャラをゲット","translatedEnglishLine":"Obtain an item or character."},{"lineNumber":257669,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＩＰボディのシィルの魂が抜けてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Seel's soul leaves her IP body."},{"lineNumber":257670,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが率いるの部隊は魔人討伐隊","translatedEnglishLine":"The unit led by Lance is a demon extermination squad."},{"lineNumber":257671,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tウルザから今後の戦い方について説明を受ける","translatedEnglishLine":"Receive explanation from Urza about the future battle strategy."},{"lineNumber":257672,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物界から魔人サテラが戻ってきた、ホーネット様が捕まった","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Satera returned from the monster world, Lady Hornet has been captured."},{"lineNumber":257673,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城に集まっていた各国姫様達は国に帰る","translatedEnglishLine":"The princesses from various countries gathered at Lance Castle return to their nations."},{"lineNumber":257674,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＣＩＴＹの住民の多くは疎開している","translatedEnglishLine":"Many residents of the CITY have evacuated."},{"lineNumber":257675,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tコパンドンが大量の物資をランス城や他国へ","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon sends a large amount of supplies to Lance Castle and other countries."},{"lineNumber":257676,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t補給関係は安心出来る状態","translatedEnglishLine":"The supply situation is stable and secure."},{"lineNumber":257677,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城に各国代表が集結","translatedEnglishLine":"Representatives from various countries gather at Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":257678,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t重要な決定事項などを行う会議が行われた","translatedEnglishLine":"A meeting was held to discuss important decisions."},{"lineNumber":257679,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスは面倒だから会議をサボる","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance skips the meeting because it's bothersome."},{"lineNumber":257680,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t自分の子供達を集めた保育園がある事を知る","translatedEnglishLine":"He learns there is a daycare gathering his own children."},{"lineNumber":257681,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t保母は千姫","translatedEnglishLine":"The caregiver is Chihime."},{"lineNumber":257682,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍にランス城が人類の中枢と気が付かれた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army realized Lance Castle is the human stronghold."},{"lineNumber":257683,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人レッドアイを含む３０万の魔軍が迫った","translatedEnglishLine":"300,000 demon troops including the demon Red Eye are approaching."},{"lineNumber":257684,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの地を放棄すると人類の連携が崩れる恐れがある","translatedEnglishLine":"If this land is abandoned, the cooperation among humans might collapse."},{"lineNumber":257685,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスは脱出でなく迎撃を選択する","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance chooses to intercept, not to escape."},{"lineNumber":257686,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t決戦前夜","translatedEnglishLine":"The night before the decisive battle."},{"lineNumber":257687,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＪＡＰＡＮからの２万援軍が到着","translatedEnglishLine":"20,000 reinforcements arrive from JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":257688,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t徹夜で量産型あてな２号が作られた","translatedEnglishLine":"They worked overnight to build the mass-produced model Atene No. 2."},{"lineNumber":257689,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t保育園にちらっと寄るランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance stops by the daycare briefly."},{"lineNumber":257690,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t決戦という事で各国の姫が集まっているがシーラだけいない","translatedEnglishLine":"With the decisive battle approaching, princesses from various countries gather, but Seera is the only one missing."},{"lineNumber":257691,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t翌朝、城内で作戦会議","translatedEnglishLine":"The next morning, a strategy meeting is held inside the castle."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか理由をつけて徴兵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They make excuses to conscript soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰路につくランス、コパンドンにもらった高速の高級うし車に乗っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance is on his way home, riding in a high-speed luxury ox cart received from Copandon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、おつかれさまです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel, thank you for your hard work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつらあまっちょろい、俺様が言わないと本気にならないからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those guys are too soft; they won't get serious unless I tell them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな軽口を言うランスだが内心は分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance speaks lightly like that, but deep down he understands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国精一杯している、ランスが言わなくてもそれに似たような事は実際にもうしているはず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each country is doing their best; even if Lance doesn’t say it, they are probably already doing something similar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国土の半分を魔軍に支配され逃げ回り自らの命を守る事だけで精一杯の者が大半だろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most are probably just scrambling to survive, their lands half controlled by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げた者も多くいるはずだ、今戦っている者達はほんとよく集まった勇気ある連中だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many must have fled; those who are fighting now are truly brave people who gathered well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが・・足りていない、このままではいずれ滅ぼされてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... it’s not enough; if things continue like this, they will eventually be destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が・・早く、全ての魔人を倒し、この戦いを終わらせなければ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I must... quickly defeat all the demons and end this war...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも重い物を背負っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance was carrying a heavy burden as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがそれを察して声をかけると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel sensed it and spoke to him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は俺のストレス発散奴隷だーとかスカートめくったりする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He says things like 'You’re my stress-relief slave' and lifts up her skirt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （実際、ランスはそういう事でストレスをうまく発散させている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (In fact, Lance successfully relieves stress this way.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あけましておめでとう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Happy New Year.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城でそれぽい朝の儀式、おとそ、お年玉
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A morning ceremony fitting for the occasion at Lance Castle: New Year's sake and New Year's money.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが仕切る、さぁ、ここまで今は非常時なのですぐに行動に移りましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone takes charge: ‘Now, this is an emergency, so let's move into action immediately.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう、情緒のわからんやつだ、お正月は３日は仕事したら駄目なんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, you have no sense of tradition. You can’t work for three days during New Year's.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが人類にとって最後のお正月になってもいいのでしたらね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unless you want this to be humanity's last New Year's.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、世界には今も死にかけている人が多数おり、ランスさんが動かないと今もまた・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, many people in the world are still on the brink of death, and if Lance doesn’t act, even now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、もう・・わかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, alright, I get it already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ひとつだけしなければいけない事がある、これだけして仕事に移る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But there's one thing I must do first, just this, then I'll get to work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、３時間で終わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, it will be done in three hours.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姫はじめだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the first princess deed of the year!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、今年最初の俺様の初精液を受けれる幸運な女の子は誰かな・・よし、正月らしくあみだで決めよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, who will be the lucky girl to receive my first semen of the year? Alright, let's decide by lottery in the New Year's spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わくわくする子、いやがる子、いろいろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some girls excited, some reluctant, various reactions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・シィルに決まった、またお前か・・だが、まぁ、それもよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Seel was chosen, it's you again... but well, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: て・・ランス様、昨晩その・・というか、６時間前に今年のやりおわりだからって・・その・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh... Lord Lance, about last night... or rather, six hours ago, since it was the end of this year's business... well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここエロシーンにするかは未定）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It’s undecided whether this will be an erotic scene.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルと一緒に海岸に来るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance arrives at the beach together with Seel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海か・・１０年前は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea, huh... ten years ago...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ａ．冒険船があるが、今は使っている時では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A. There is an adventure ship, but now is not the time to use it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｂ．冒険船があったらなぁ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B. If only there was an adventure ship...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、海岸に何かが漂着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, something drifted ashore on the beach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｱｲﾃﾑかキャラをゲット
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Obtain an item or character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＰボディのシィルの魂が抜けてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel's soul leaves her IP body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが率いるの部隊は魔人討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The unit led by Lance is a demon extermination squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザから今後の戦い方について説明を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receive explanation from Urza about the future battle strategy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界から魔人サテラが戻ってきた、ホーネット様が捕まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Satera returned from the monster world, Lady Hornet has been captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に集まっていた各国姫様達は国に帰る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The princesses from various countries gathered at Lance Castle return to their nations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＣＩＴＹの住民の多くは疎開している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many residents of the CITY have evacuated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンが大量の物資をランス城や他国へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon sends a large amount of supplies to Lance Castle and other countries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 補給関係は安心出来る状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The supply situation is stable and secure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に各国代表が集結
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Representatives from various countries gather at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重要な決定事項などを行う会議が行われた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A meeting was held to discuss important decisions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは面倒だから会議をサボる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance skips the meeting because it's bothersome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の子供達を集めた保育園がある事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He learns there is a daycare gathering his own children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 保母は千姫
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The caregiver is Chihime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にランス城が人類の中枢と気が付かれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army realized Lance Castle is the human stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを含む３０万の魔軍が迫った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 300,000 demon troops including the demon Red Eye are approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地を放棄すると人類の連携が崩れる恐れがある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this land is abandoned, the cooperation among humans might collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは脱出でなく迎撃を選択する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance chooses to intercept, not to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決戦前夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The night before the decisive battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮからの２万援軍が到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 20,000 reinforcements arrive from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹夜で量産型あてな２号が作られた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They worked overnight to build the mass-produced model Atene No. 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 保育園にちらっと寄るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance stops by the daycare briefly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決戦という事で各国の姫が集まっているがシーラだけいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the decisive battle approaching, princesses from various countries gather, but Seera is the only one missing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、城内で作戦会議
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, a strategy meeting is held inside the castle.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

You can’t work for three days during New Year's."},{"lineNumber":257651,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tこれが人類にとって最後のお正月になってもいいのでしたらね","translatedEnglishLine":"Unless you want this to be humanity's last New Year's."},{"lineNumber":257652,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tまた、世界には今も死にかけている人が多数おり、ランスさんが動かないと今もまた・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, many people in the world are still on the brink of death, and if Lance doesn’t act, even now..."},{"lineNumber":257653,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tああ、もう・・わかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, alright, I get it already."},{"lineNumber":257654,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tだが、ひとつだけしなければいけない事がある、これだけして仕事に移る","translatedEnglishLine":"But there's one thing I must do first, just this, then I'll get to work."},{"lineNumber":257655,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t大丈夫、３時間で終わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, it will be done in three hours."},{"lineNumber":257656,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t姫はじめだー","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the first princess deed of the year!"},{"lineNumber":257657,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tさぁ、今年最初の俺様の初精液を受けれる幸運な女の子は誰かな・・よし、正月らしくあみだで決めよう","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, who will be the lucky girl to receive my first semen of the year? Alright, let's decide by lottery in the New Year's spirit."},{"lineNumber":257658,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tわくわくする子、いやがる子、いろいろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Some girls excited, some reluctant, various reactions."},{"lineNumber":257659,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t・・・シィルに決まった、またお前か・・だが、まぁ、それもよい","translatedEnglishLine":"...Seel was chosen, it's you again... but well, that's fine."},{"lineNumber":257660,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tて・・ランス様、昨晩その・・というか、６時間前に今年のやりおわりだからって・・その・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh... There is an adventure ship, but now is not the time to use it."},{"lineNumber":257666,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tＢ．冒険船があったらなぁ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"B. If only there was an adventure ship..."},{"lineNumber":257667,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tその時、海岸に何かが漂着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, something drifted ashore on the captured."},{"lineNumber":257673,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城に集まっていた各国姫様達は国に帰る","translatedEnglishLine":"The princesses from various countries gathered at Lance Castle return to their Seera is the only one missing."},{"lineNumber":257691,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t翌朝、城内で作戦会議","translatedEnglishLine":"The next morning, a strategy meeting is held inside the castle."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか理由をつけて徴兵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They make excuses to conscript soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、７万ほどの兵士が集まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Lance's reckless orders, about 70,000 soldiers gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰路につくランス、コパンドンにもらった高速の高級うし車に乗っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance is on his way home, riding in a high-speed luxury ox cart received from Copandon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、おつかれさまです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel, thank you for your hard work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつらあまっちょろい、俺様が言わないと本気にならないからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those guys are too soft; they won't get serious unless I tell them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな軽口を言うランスだが内心は分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance speaks lightly like that, but deep down he understands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国精一杯している、ランスが言わなくてもそれに似たような事は実際にもうしているはず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each country is doing their best; even if Lance doesn’t say it, they are probably already doing something similar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国土の半分を魔軍に支配され逃げ回り自らの命を守る事だけで精一杯の者が大半だろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most are probably just scrambling to survive, their lands half controlled by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げた者も多くいるはずだ、今戦っている者達はほんとよく集まった勇気ある連中だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many must have fled; those who are fighting now are truly brave people who gathered well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが・・足りていない、このままではいずれ滅ぼされてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... it’s not enough; if things continue like this, they will eventually be destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が・・早く、全ての魔人を倒し、この戦いを終わらせなければ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I must... quickly defeat all the demons and end this war...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも重い物を背負っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance was carrying a heavy burden as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがそれを察して声をかけると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel sensed it and spoke to him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は俺のストレス発散奴隷だーとかスカートめくったりする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He says things like 'You’re my stress-relief slave' and lifts up her skirt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （実際、ランスはそういう事でストレスをうまく発散させている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (In fact, Lance successfully relieves stress this way.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あけましておめでとう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Happy New Year.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城でそれぽい朝の儀式、おとそ、お年玉
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A morning ceremony fitting for the occasion at Lance Castle: New Year's sake and New Year's money.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが仕切る、さぁ、ここまで今は非常時なのですぐに行動に移りましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone takes charge: ‘Now, this is an emergency, so let's move into action immediately.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう、情緒のわからんやつだ、お正月は３日は仕事したら駄目なんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, you have no sense of tradition. You can’t work for three days during New Year's.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが人類にとって最後のお正月になってもいいのでしたらね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unless you want this to be humanity's last New Year's.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、世界には今も死にかけている人が多数おり、ランスさんが動かないと今もまた・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, many people in the world are still on the brink of death, and if Lance doesn’t act, even now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、もう・・わかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, alright, I get it already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ひとつだけしなければいけない事がある、これだけして仕事に移る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But there's one thing I must do first, just this, then I'll get to work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、３時間で終わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, it will be done in three hours.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姫はじめだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the first princess deed of the year!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、今年最初の俺様の初精液を受けれる幸運な女の子は誰かな・・よし、正月らしくあみだで決めよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, who will be the lucky girl to receive my first semen of the year? Alright, let's decide by lottery in the New Year's spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わくわくする子、いやがる子、いろいろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some girls excited, some reluctant, various reactions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・シィルに決まった、またお前か・・だが、まぁ、それもよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Seel was chosen, it's you again... but well, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: て・・ランス様、昨晩その・・というか、６時間前に今年のやりおわりだからって・・その・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh... Lord Lance, about last night... or rather, six hours ago, since it was the end of this year's business... well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ここエロシーンにするかは未定）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It’s undecided whether this will be an erotic scene.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルと一緒に海岸に来るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance arrives at the beach together with Seel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海か・・１０年前は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea, huh... ten years ago...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ａ．冒険船があるが、今は使っている時では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A. There is an adventure ship, but now is not the time to use it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｂ．冒険船があったらなぁ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B. If only there was an adventure ship...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、海岸に何かが漂着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, something drifted ashore on the beach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ｱｲﾃﾑかキャラをゲット
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Obtain an item or character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＰボディのシィルの魂が抜けてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seel's soul leaves her IP body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが率いるの部隊は魔人討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The unit led by Lance is a demon extermination squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザから今後の戦い方について説明を受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receive explanation from Urza about the future battle strategy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界から魔人サテラが戻ってきた、ホーネット様が捕まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Satera returned from the monster world, Lady Hornet has been captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に集まっていた各国姫様達は国に帰る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The princesses from various countries gathered at Lance Castle return to their nations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＣＩＴＹの住民の多くは疎開している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many residents of the CITY have evacuated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンが大量の物資をランス城や他国へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon sends a large amount of supplies to Lance Castle and other countries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 補給関係は安心出来る状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The supply situation is stable and secure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に各国代表が集結
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Representatives from various countries gather at Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重要な決定事項などを行う会議が行われた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A meeting was held to discuss important decisions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは面倒だから会議をサボる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance skips the meeting because it's bothersome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の子供達を集めた保育園がある事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He learns there is a daycare gathering his own children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 保母は千姫
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The caregiver is Chihime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にランス城が人類の中枢と気が付かれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army realized Lance Castle is the human stronghold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイを含む３０万の魔軍が迫った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 300,000 demon troops including the demon Red Eye are approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地を放棄すると人類の連携が崩れる恐れがある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If this land is abandoned, the cooperation among humans might collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは脱出でなく迎撃を選択する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance chooses to intercept, not to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決戦前夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The night before the decisive battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮからの２万援軍が到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 20,000 reinforcements arrive from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹夜で量産型あてな２号が作られた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They worked overnight to build the mass-produced model Atene No. 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 保育園にちらっと寄るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance stops by the daycare briefly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決戦という事で各国の姫が集まっているがシーラだけいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the decisive battle approaching, princesses from various countries gather, but Seera is the only one missing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、城内で作戦会議
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, a strategy meeting is held inside the castle.
